SEARCH
Package playwriter

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
playwriter.Utils
public final class Utils extends Object
Represents a collection of constants and utility functions.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Almerge

  • Method Details

    • isKeyword

      public static boolean isKeyword(String value)
      Check if word is a keyword.
      Parameters:
      value - String to check.
      Returns:
      true if value is a keyword, false otherwise.

    • getFullAppName

      public static String getFullAppName()
      Gets application name with version. This contains APP_NAME and VERSION.
      Returns:
      Application name with version.

    • getCopyright

      public static String getCopyright()
      Gets copyright text. This contains COPYRIGHT_START, COPYRIGHT_END and DEVELOPER_NAME.
      Returns:
      Copyright text.

    • getPdfContentCreator

      public static String getPdfContentCreator()
      Gets PDF content creator. This contains getFullAppName() and getCopyright().
      Returns:
      PDF content creator.

    • failWith

      public static void failWith(String errorMsg) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Stops the program execution by throwing a PlayCompileTimeError with the given error message.
      Parameters:
      errorMsg - Error message.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - with errorMsg as error message.

    • check

      public static void check(boolean result, String errorMsg) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Asserts a value is true, or throws PlayCompileTimeError if it is false.
      Parameters:
      result - Value to check.
      errorMsg - Error message to use in case the check failed.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if result is false.

    • convertFontToInt

      public static int convertFontToInt(String numberText) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Converts a String to an integer, between MIN_FONT_SIZE and MAX_FONT_SIZE.
      Parameters:
      numberText - String to convert.
      Returns:
      Integer conversion of text.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if numberText doesn't have an unsigned integer format, is less than MIN_FONT_SIZE or greater than MAX_FONT_SIZE.

    • convertToInt

      public static int convertToInt(String numberText, int minimum, int maximum) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Converts a String to an integer, between minimum and maximum.
      Parameters:
      numberText - String to convert.
      minimum - Minimum possible value of numberText.
      maximum - Maximum possible value of numberText.
      Returns:
      Integer conversion of text.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if numberText doesn't have an unsigned integer format, is less than minimum or greater than maximum.
